name: Celebi ex
author: Ryo Ueda

poke_power.name: Time Reversal
poke_power.effect: Once during your turn, when you put Celebi ex from your hand onto your Bench, you may search your discard pile for a card, show it to your opponent, and put it on top of your deck.

attacks.name: Psychic Shield
attacks.effect: Prevent all effects of attacks, including damage, done to Celebi ex by your opponent’s Pokémon-ex during your opponent’s next turn.

rule_box: When Pokémon-ex has been Knocked Out, your opponent takes 2 Prize cards.
